story: I was a very heavy smoker, since I began working in my early twenties.  I was so happy to have found this app! Not only did it help me quit, but I really enjoy looking back on my journals and seeing my progress unfold.  Feeling better than I have in years and am looking forward to the rest of my quitting journey!

My quitting journey has beena tough one, but I love using this app to help me keep going.  My journal entries have become a daily ritual, and it makes me reflect and focus on why I am doing this in the first place.

One year has passed since I chose to change my life and quit smoking for good.  Probably the best decision I have ever made! I feel better than ever, I am saving thousands of dollars and I am looking forward to a much healthier future! This app has been a great tool for me to focus on my daily journey and stay focused on my quitting journey.
Quitting cigarettes is the hardest thing I have ever chosen to do, but it is totally worth it.  You can do it too! Don't give up.
If I could give this app 5 stars, I would! Feeling great.
The app was very intuitive, but I cannot stop smoking.  I will keep trying though!

Once I was a very heavy smoker, but now I am much better! This app was great, and I loved checking my chart after my daily updates to see how my progress was going.  I really feel like this was a huge help for me to finally quit smoking.  I had tried before, but this app was by far the most effective way.
I enjoyed the app, it helped me a lot.
My smoking was out of control, but now I am getting control of my addiction. This app is a good place to start and lean on, but it is ultimately up to you to quit smoking.

Smoking 2 packs a day really hurt my health, and I was beginning to see the effects. I could not be as active as I used to be, and I was having trouble breathing doing daily activities.  My doctor said I needed to quit smoking if I wanted to live a healthy life, so I tried this app.  Worked wonders for me, I love the daily entries and being able to track my progress graphically. This really helped me, maybe it can help you too.
